Question
========

Which of the following 4 quantities is a measure of the dispersion of the sample mean?

Answerlist
----------

* Range
* SEM
* Standard deviation
* Variance

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Range: Incorrect
* SEM: Correct
* Standard deviation: Incorrect
* Variance: Incorrect
